metadata.title: Bird with Rabbits vs. Skeletal Choir

tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
The dullahan general and horse gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal wyverns
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
Text, 23, Bird with Rabbits vs Skeletal Choir
Label, Canyon of Ancient Souls
A shadow resembling a scorpion tail silhouette moves behind a rock
Sunraku rubs his eyes
He walks
between rocks
past some big rocks
Wyvern skeletons roar, then pause
Sunraku takes an intimidating pose as they run.
Rocks line the path. Ash falls.
A dark aura gathers
They walk into a 50 foot tall wall of smoke
He walks through the smoke
He can see about 5 feet in front of him. Tendrils of smoke whisp by
Bilac and Emul look around.
An inky black aura gathers around hair. A desicated hand grips a bone with strips of flesh.
He equips moon blades
The lich roars
The witch floats, holding a fleshy bone staff. Its red dress, resembling raw meat, floats in the air.
6 human mandibles, with full sets of teeth, crown the bone staff. The teeth glow purple.
The lich raises the bone staff.
6 dark orbs form in a circle
She dons a monocle
prepares a grimoire
and fires
The lich fires dark orbs back
She rubs the decapitator aginst a rock and pours holy water on it
Emul strikes the lich
Another lich head appears
and another
6 lich heads float around the lich
The lich heads grow skeletal bodies. Smoke gathers around them and form into weapons.
One strikes with a scythe. Another with twin blades.
Sunraku dodges. Another strikes with a spear.
He catches the unblemished, shining decapitator, steaming with holy water.
The water splashes a lich. The group of liches retreat.
The 7 liches open and close their skull mouths
The liches lunge
Bilac hops on his shoulder. He dodges a strike.
A lich draws a bow and fires
He skates away
The sword lich pursues and strikes. He evades. Sword lich takes the arrow.
She pouts
He pitches Bilac. She flies past the liches.
She watches as 4 liches attack in a circle. A tornado appears and expands around them.
Sunraku lands outside the lich circle
Adds a bonus to all stats for five minutes, but halves all stats after that.
minus 20% of max HP as damage, increases strength and agility.
HP 4. He runs up a rock.
He decapitates the archer lich
He decapitates the axe lich. He engages 2 liches.
A lich head flies
Smoke blows. He throws Emul in the air.
Staff Lich screams
The strike hits the lich
He skates up
He strikes under the chin
The sword lies wedged in the spine
She hammers the end of the sword, crackling with red lightning
The lich screams, and the decapitator flies through its neck. The lich dissipates.
Emul falls
and bounces off Sunraku's head
HP 1
Bilac picks up the cracking decapitator
Grudge Bone Fragment.
Smoke dissipates
He looks up at the falling ash and purple mist
Pixel art Sunraku travels from the Canyon of Ancient Souls to Eighthold
A white and blue bridge lined with blue crystals spans clear, blue water.
The city is made of high rise buildings of blue brick and blue marble, topped with blue crystals. Label, Eighth City, Eighthold.
Players walk across a bridge. Crystal lined stairs lead to gondolas on the river.
Dialog, Register landmark?
From the forge, the bunnies close the door, and it disappears.
He buys 3 carrots
Pixelated Sunraku travels from Eighthold to the Canyon of Ancient Souls.
He stretches
Text, 28, Emul's Sleeptalking
Sunraku and Emul stay near a camp fire.
He places a blanket over her
